title: Quicksilver ooze
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

*For a list of all jellies, see [list of jellies](/List_of_jellies "List of jellies").*

| quicksilver ooze J [![Quicksilver ooze.png](/images/b/b6/Quicksilver_ooze.png)](/File:Quicksilver_ooze.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                   |

|   |                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A thin coating of shining, reflective goo, covering a great area and rushing forward with startling speed. Enchantments slide off it like water. |

## Useful info

**Quicksilver oozes** move fast and hit fast, with attacks that [engulf](/Engulf "Engulf") and drain MP. They are commonly found in the [Slime Pits](/The_Slime_Pits "The Slime Pits") but are occasionally found in the late Dungeon or Depths.

## Tips & Tricks

- Their [engulf](/Engulf "Engulf") will effectively [silence](/Silence "Silence") you until you move away (or kill the ooze). Try to avoid being surrounded by jellies when quicksilver oozes are in play.
- Quicksilver oozes have decent evasion and are immune to [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes"), but have few other defenses to speak of and aren't very durable. Unavoidable damaging spells, wands, or evocables can take care of them easily enough.

## History

- In [0.33](/0.33 "0.33"), quicksilver oozes will be renamed into **void oozes**.
- Quicksilver oozes were added in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27").
html:
Quicksilver ooze

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.

For a list of all jellies, see list of jellies.

quicksilver ooze J 
HP 33-67
HD 13
XP 1459
Speed 16
AC 3
EV 15
Will Immune
Attack1 27 (hit: engulf)
Attack2 15 (hit: antimagic)


Resistances rPois+
rAcid+++
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Giant
Type jelly, quicksilver ooze
Flags Destroys doors
See invisible
Unblindable
Web immune
A thin coating of shining, reflective goo, covering a great area and rushing forward with startling speed. Enchantments slide off it like water.

Useful info

Quicksilver oozes move fast and hit fast, with attacks that engulf and drain MP. They are commonly found in the Slime Pits but are occasionally found in the late Dungeon or Depths.

Tips & Tricks

  • Their engulf will effectively silence you until you move away (or kill the ooze). Try to avoid being surrounded by jellies when quicksilver oozes are in play.
  • Quicksilver oozes have decent evasion and are immune to Hexes, but have few other defenses to speak of and aren't very durable. Unavoidable damaging spells, wands, or evocables can take care of them easily enough.

History

  • In 0.33, quicksilver oozes will be renamed into void oozes.
  • Quicksilver oozes were added in 0.27.
